Name: Astral Recall Keyâ€‹
Description: Use to reset all upgraded skills of your current class back to Level 1, Tier 0. After resetting, all Luno (bound) spent on skill advancement will be refunded, and all Advance Books consumed for skill advancement will be converted at a 1:1 ratio into "Advance Book - Select (bound)."
Description2: A mysterious legacy from the Bapharian Divines. In the fleeting instant of fate's reset, only adventurers who resonate with it can awaken the Engram within, allowing the long-circulating power to reverse and return to its origin.
